items.label:
URL Format For Entry View
		
	
										Default
										
											http://yoursite.com/menu/view/title
										
									
										Date Based
										
											http://yoursite.com/menu/view/year/month/date/title
										
									
										Category Based
										
											http://yoursite.com/menu/view/category/title
										
									
										Category & Date Based
										
											http://yoursite.com/menu/view/category/year/month/date/title
										
									
										Simple
										
											http://yoursite.com/menu/title
										
									
										Simple Category
										
											http://yoursite.com/menu/category/title
										
									
										Custom
										
											http://yoursite.com/menu/view/
											
											/title

Routing Behavior
		
	
										Default
										
											This option will detect the view portion in a URL and determine which menu id is suitable for the particular link.										
									
										Use Specified Menu Id
										
											This option will enforce all Itemid to the one set below
items.keywords: the menu option will particular set one itemid all enforce
